publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7675 Pauline McNeill: Welcome to Tian Tian and Yangguangâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the news that Tian Tian and Yangguang, two giant pandas, are coming to Edinburgh Zoo under the custodianship of the Royal Zoological Society of Scotland; acknowledges that, as a result of this historic agreement with China, this will mean that these are the first two giant pandas to live in the United Kingdom in 17 years; celebrates that Scotland has been selected by China to take part in the breeding programme for giant pandas, and considers that this is a clear recognition of the wealth of talent and expertise of the staff at Edinburgh Zoo.
S3M-7675 Welcome to Tian Tian and Yangguang (lodged on 10 January 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-7675 Welcome to Tian Tian and Yangguang (lodged on 10 January 2011) Jack McConnell*, Sarah Boyack*
